title: Client crashes before loading
body:
Hello everyone, I have been trying to patch my game but it crashes all the time. I did all the basic trouble shooting that is suggested on the site with no luck. (uninstalled/reinstalled league, reset my router and modem, reverted back to windows 8, took firewalls down, etc) Below is the patcher log that has errors right before it crashes. 

000000.372| ALWAYS| Riot::RADS::Patching::UpdateAndInstallShared::DownloadFilesStep: Starting timing
000000.383|   OKAY| Riot::RADS::Common::HTTPConnection::GetFileSize: ("/releases/live/projects/lol_patcher/releases/0.0.0.64/packages/files/packagemanifest")
000000.428|   OKAY| Riot::RADS::Common::HTTPConnection::GetFileSize: file size: 25490
000000.428|   OKAY| Riot::RADS::Common::HTTPConnection::GetFile: ("/releases/live/projects/lol_patcher/releases/0.0.0.64/packages/files/packagemanifest", "C:/Riot Games/League of Legends/RADS/temp/TMP1.tmp", 0x030CF530)
000000.503|   OKAY| Riot::RADS::Common::PackageManifest::Load: ("C:/Riot Games/League of Legends/RADS/temp/TMP1.tmp")

000044.897|  ERROR| Riot::RADS::Common::HTTPConnection::GetFile: C:/jenkins/workspace/rads-code-win-release/code/Solutions/RiotRADS/Source/RADS/Common/HTTPConnection.cpp(794): Perform request failed: "Timeout was reached" (curl code 28), for file:'/releases/live/projects/lol_patcher/releases/0.0.0.64/packages/files/BIN_0x00000000'.
000090.322|  ERROR| Riot::RADS::Common::HTTPConnection::GetFile: C:/jenkins/workspace/rads-code-win-release/code/Solutions/RiotRADS/Source/RADS/Common/HTTPConnection.cpp(794): Perform request failed: "Timeout was reached" (curl code 28), for file:'/releases/live/projects/lol_patcher/releases/0.0.0.64/packages/files/BIN_0x00000000'.
000134.339|  ERROR| Riot::RADS::Common::HTTPConnection::GetFile: C:/jenkins/workspace/rads-code-win-release/code/Solutions/RiotRADS/Source/RADS/Common/HTTPConnection.cpp(794): Perform request failed: "Timeout was reached" (curl code 28), for file:'/releases/live/projects/lol_patcher/releases/0.0.0.64/packages/files/BIN_0x00000000'.
000134.346|  ERROR| Riot::RADS::Common::HTTPConnection::GetFile: Failed retrieving '/releases/live/projects/lol_patcher/releases/0.0.0.64/packages/files/BIN_0x00000000' after 3 attempts.
000134.347|  ERROR| Riot::RADS::Patching::GetFileUsingPackageGridLoad::GetPackageForFile: C:/jenkins/workspace/rads-code-win-release/code/Solutions/RiotRADS/Source/RADS/Patching/Networking/GridLoad/GetFileUsingPackageGridLoad.cpp(404): Failed to download bin
000134.347|  ERROR| Riot::RADS::Patching::DownloadManager::DownloadThread: c:/jenkins/workspace/rads-code-win-release/code/solutions/riotrads/source/rads/patching/networking/DownloadManager.inl(150): Failed to download package for file, "/releases/live/projects/lol_patcher/releases/0.0.0.29/files/BsSndRpt.exe.compressed".
000134.347|  ERROR| Riot::RADS::Patching::UpdateAndInstallShared::`anonymous-namespace'::ConsumeDownloadManager: C:/jenkins/workspace/rads-code-win-release/code/Solutions/RiotRADS/Source/RADS/Patching/Install/UpdateAndInstallShared.cpp(111): Error while consuming download manager

Caused by:

        Riot::RADS::Patching::DownloadManager::DownloadThread: c:/jenkins/workspace/rads-code-win-release/code/solutions/riotrads/source/rads/patching/networking/DownloadManager.inl(150): Failed to download package for file, "/releases/live/projects/lol_patcher/releases/0.0.0.29/files/BsSndRpt.exe.compressed".
        Caused by:

replies.body: It looks to me like your patcher is unable to read and write files.  This could be due to your OS settings or permissions, which is preventing the patcher from accessing necessary folders.  I recommend going over our [permissions ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions)guide as a first step to troubleshoot this.  It should get you fixed up for good, but let me know if you run into issues!
I did all the required steps in the permissions with no luck. I have the networkinfo, process info, and direct x diagnostics ready.

Thanks for the follow up!  Hit us up by submitting a[ support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), and our tech team can look into this with you.  Attach those logs in your ticket to help get some more context.  We'll respond asap!
